member.param: to specify that the field is exportable; otherwise, .

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether a field is exportable.
member.value: if the field is exportable; otherwise, .

member.name: P:Cadru.Data.Annotations.ExportableAttribute.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order weight of the column.
member.remarks: Columns are sorted in increasing order based on the order value. Columns without this attribute have an order value of 0. Negative values are valid and can be used to position a column before all non-negative columns. If an order is not specified, presentation layers should consider using the value 10000. This value lets explicitly-ordered fields be displayed before and after the fields that do not have a specified order.
